headline: Show HN: HertzBeat – An open-source, real-time monitoring system
description:
Hi everyone!

Very happy to be able to recommend an open source project here.

Hertzbeat is an open-source, real-time monitoring system with custom-monitor and agentless. Support web service, database, os, middleware and more.

Here’s a video of show: https://youtu.be/eb_Nosl9fZY. Very open to feedback.

github: https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat

home: https://hertzbeat.com/en/

Very welcome to use and give us a star! Thanks!!!!
